channel.title: Serious Sam HD
channel.description: this game is so fucking fun to play, i do not have it since i need to get myself a rapidshare acc first, to download it. But its basically exactly the same as Serious Sam 1 (the first encounter) but much better graphics. you'd have hours of fun, so addicting and such an easy type of FPS game to play.

item.title: Serious Sam HD
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

I played Serious Sam 1 and The Second Encounter on release, enjoyed them quite a bit. I’ll dl the new one from usenet and put it on my vps so community members can grab it.
